review_text: It's in a park with a beer garden, which is very pleasant. We are too early due to my train @ 8:05pm, unable to have their famous roasted goat in whole, in a private hut. The main dinning hut is comfortable. The foods are delicious.

Friends took is there which is a bit far away from city. It's in fact next to the 2008 Olympics stadiums. Mongolian dishes appear to be more meat oriented with different cooking varieties. Fun place to visit.
